summary: Adds "Schlongs of Skyrim" support for Drachis Argonians.
descriptionHtml:
I favor Drachis Argonians mod as a texture replacer. However, it doesn't really support Schlongs of Skyrim, so I wanted to fix that. I changed the schlong textures too, but only for the Average variant.

Note that it doesn't support Raptor Feet like my other mod does. Because the feet that has toes included in SoS has a different UV-map while Raptor Feet uses vanilla UV's (I believe). But I might add a patch in the future.

What differs this mod from the original "Drachis Argonians" is that those textures lacked mipmaps so I decided to generate mipmaps in Gimp, but the textures in my mod are also uncompressed.

I disabled comments to be on the safe side. The last thing I want to hear is people complaining about seeing d*cks everywhere on the Nexus.

I would like to thank Drachi for letting users edit his work for compatibility with other mods!
author: T3alrose and Drachis
